cast.name: 阿什莉·莱格特 Ashley Leggat
詹姆斯·A·伍兹 James A. Woods

introduction: When the music label XMP! Music announces a contest for an up-and-coming band to win the opportunity to open for pop star Charlie Fever (Shemar Charles), the company's rogue receptionist-turned-manager Zoe (Ashley Leggat) sees a chance to prove herself to her spoiled, arrogant boss Archie (James A. Woods), and quickly recruits a group of talented teen performers (Camden Angelis, Demetrius Joyette, Brock Morgan, Cristine Prosperi and Amanda Thomson) to form the band Totally Amp'd. But they must overcome their differences as well as many obstacles along the way if they want a shot at winning the musical competition of their lives. In addition to adapting to working together as a band, Zoe and Totally Amp'd have to contend with Archie's underhanded scheming. After confidently making a bet with him that her band will win (and putting her job on the line in the process), Zoe finds out the hard way that Archie will stop at nothing to ensure that his pet project - smooth boy band Delicious ...
